question: William picks 215 raspberrys on Sunday. Then he picks 179 raspberrys on Monday. On Tuesday, he picks three times the number of raspberrys he did on Sunday. How many raspberrys does William have?
answer:
Combining Sunday and Monday, William has 215 raspberrys + 179 raspberrys = <<215+179=394>>394 raspberrys.
On Tuesday, he picks 3*215 raspberrys = <<3*215=645>>645 raspberrys.
Altogether, William has 394 raspberrys + 645 raspberrys = <<394+645=1039>>1039 raspberrys.
#### 1039
